install to c:desktop:games folder to get it to work n run reg.exe as admin aswell

REGEDIT4

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI\PES2011]
"code"="SWY7-HTUN-3YF5-CD4D-W3AF"
"installdir"="C:\\Konami\\PES2011\\" 
"version"="1.00.0000"


"installdir"="C:\\Konami\\PES2011\\" 

be sure you have your install path inside above

w-W-w-multi--upload-DOT--com--/--JOPSMAJAT

remove all -

download to your game path
(c:konami\pes2011) double click, enjoy

COMMENTARY FIXED!!!

Hey guys I worked out how to fix the commentary problem. Go into the "img" folder and you will see a file named "dt00_f" (its 422mb). You need to change the "f" to an "e" and the commentary will be fixed. 



Simple fix :-)

OK Hi GUYS,,,,,Im ur hero to get the game working U ahve to do the following see the reg.exe? in the folder u installed pes 2011,now underneath it is a folder named regsetup.exe Delete everything in it,,,,and type this REGEDIT4

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI\PES2011]
"code"="SWY7-HTUN-3YF5-CD4D-W3AF"
"installdir"="C:\\Konami\\PES2011\\"
"version"="1.00.0000" NOW when u did this run reg.exe as admin(win 7) or run it by double clikcing in XP.       now ur game will work,,,THIS IS ONLY IF U GET THE EROR GAME NOT INSTALLED Comentary Fixe is when u change the dt00_f.img to dt00_e.img 
UR WELCOME :)
